New Records: Andrew McCutchen reached 20 home runs in a Pittsburgh Pirates uniform for the eighth time
Key Match Events: Andrew McCutchen hit a three-run home run during the fifth inning of a baseball game against the Miami Marlins
Post-Match Reflections: Andrew McCutchen expressed his desire to play for the Pirates again and reach more milestones
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates won the game 6-4 against the Miami Marlins
Others: Andrew McCutchen's comeback season and his thoughts on what might have been if he had stayed with the Pirates
